author: henry
post: Just like his father the devil, Bill O’Reilly said in his heart, “I will ascend to heaven; I will raise my throne above the stars of God; I will sit enthroned on the mount of assembly, on the utmost heights of the sacred mountain. I will ascend above the tops of the clouds; I will make myself like the Most High.”.
title: The Gospel According to Bill O’Reilly Continued

author: henry
post: Bill O’Reilly is so full of himself that he deceives himself into believing. . . [edited to remove the rest of the comment.].
title: The Gospel According to Bill O’Reilly Continued
